page.title: 10 A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My name is Lee and I usually arrive at school at about 8:15am to play football.After I have finished playing football which is about 9:00am I come into class,take out my reading book and read until assembly while the teacher calls the register.After assembly we normally do English.My favourite English is writing stories. Then it is playtime,at playtime there is tuck being sold in the hall.After play there is usually math-sets,but on Wednesdays there are none.At 12:00pm we have dinner or sandwiches,then we have another play.We do different things in the afternoon such as topic, or craft,games or drama,music-workshop or science.Some people have football, netball or orchestra practices and the school has its own outdoor,heated swimming pool.The school ends at 3:15pm when we go home for our tea.
